title: Mainnet sync stuck at `Wrote block headers number=14499999` (seems restarting helps)

body:
Stuck again

```
[INFO] [06-10|16:42:45.332] [1/16 Headers] Inserting headers         progress=14806099 queue=1
[INFO] [06-10|16:43:05.332] [1/16 Headers] Inserting headers         progress=14811601 queue=1
[INFO] [06-10|16:43:17.404] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=33
[INFO] [06-10|16:43:25.333] [1/16 Headers] Inserting headers         progress=14817037 queue=1
[INFO] [06-10|16:43:45.333] [1/16 Headers] Inserting headers         progress=14822538 queue=1
[INFO] [06-10|16:44:05.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=16128.000 alloc=2.6Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:44:25.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.7Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:44:45.329] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.7Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:45:05.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.7Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:45:17.403] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth66=33
[INFO] [06-10|16:45:25.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.8Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:45:45.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.4Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:46:05.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.5Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:46:25.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.5Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:46:45.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.6Gb sys=4.2Gb
[INFO] [06-10|16:47:05.330] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.6Gb sys=4.2Gb
```

restart helped once more

```
[INFO] [06-10|17:00:12.838] Started P2P networking                   version=66 self=enode://b3c2a0e2249a44e228e94a956475834e6354c71f9a59a706176a8e941c7755eabdf228c5afb43785440877d31f4a8c0095a436885a917fdc47664c9003b7b1a7@127.0.0.1:30303 name=erigon/v2022.06.2-alpha-fd0837d9/linux-amd64/go1.18.1
[INFO] [06-10|17:00:12.838] [Snapshots] Fetching torrent files metadata
[INFO] [06-10|17:00:15.448] [Snapshots] Stat                         blocks=14499999 segments=14499999 indices=14499999 alloc=2.1Gb sys=3.6Gb
[INFO] [06-10|17:00:15.448] [1/16 Headers] Waiting for headers...    from=14822559
[INFO] [06-10|17:00:35.449] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14822559 blk/second=0.000 alloc=2.2Gb sys=3.6Gb
[INFO] [06-10|17:00:55.449] [1/16 Headers] Inserting headers         progress=14824667 queue=1
[INFO] [06-10|17:01:15.449] [1/16 Headers] Wrote block headers       number=14830239 blk/second=384.000 alloc=2.6Gb sys=3.8Gb
```

@mohoff Thank you for reporting! In your first log snippet, did you include all the anchor lines? I was looking for anchor with `anchorQueue.idx=0` but did not see it, is it because you did not include it or it wasn't there in the logs?
@AlexeyAkhunov Unfortunately I can't check anymore. In the first snippet, I copied all lines before I saw a repetitive pattern. I didn't pay attention to `anchorQueue.idx=0`
I think I know what causes this, will be fixing it soon
This will be the fix to test: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/pull/4433
@mohoff please reopen if still happening on the latest release
